Much better ball control in second period
Excellent teamwork and playing as a unit after half-time

matches.performance_notes: Improved overall performance with better team coordination throughout the match. Strong defensive work from Adam K, Owen H, and Andrew N. Travis C's free kick was a highlight moment. Andy E scored his first goal for QPR!

Travis C netted two goals including a beautiful free kick
Impressive defensive performance from Adam K
Owen H showed strong defensive partnership
Andrew N provided solid defensive work
Better team coordination than previous matches
Improved overall performance despite result

matches.performance_notes: Improved defensive performance with standout games from Yejun K and David C (best game). Adam K, Andrew N, and Owen H maintained their very good performance levels. Despite three players being unavailable (Rafael H, Alexander V, Rhodri W), the team showed resilience and better defensive organization.

Yejun K played his best game of the season
David C had his best performance
Strong continued performance from Adam K, Andrew N, and Owen H
Improved defensive organization despite unavailable players
Andy E stepped up to play goalkeeper in first half due to Rafael H being unavailable

matches.performance_notes: QPR dominated possession for 25 minutes in the first half before conceding 2 goals in the final 2 minutes. Second half saw the team control the ball in the last 15 minutes. Solid defensive performance from Andrew N. Ethan G and Andy E excelled in both midfield and attacking positions. Owen H played a crucial role in ball control before leaving for an appointment in the second half. Main area for improvement: finishing - team created many chances but struggled to convert.
highlights: Dominated possession for 25 minutes in first half
Controlled ball in final 15 minutes of second half
Andrew N solid defensive performance
Ethan G and Andy E excellent in midfield and attack
Owen H strong ball control before leaving for appointment
Created many scoring chances but struggled with finishing
Team showed resilience and positive play despite result

matches.performance_notes: FIRST WIN OF THE SEASON! Outstanding team performance with multiple players having their best games. Adam K scored a hat-trick (assisted twice by Rafael H and once by Owen H) leading the attack. Ethan G also scored (assisted by Owen H). Match flow: We scored first, they equalized, then we scored again to lead 2-1 at half-time. In the second half, we scored early to make it 3-1, they pulled one back to 3-2, then we sealed the win with our 4th goal. Extended Friday practice session clearly paid off with improved finishing and conversion of chances. Standout performances from Yejun K, Rhodri W, Adam K, Andrew N, Niko D, David C, and Owen H - all playing their best games of the season. Rafael H and Owen H provided excellent assists throughout the match.

matches.performance_notes: Solid team performance against tough opposition. Team held their ground defensively and competed at a high level throughout. Andy E scored a fantastic goal assisted by Travis C, putting training finishing work into practice. Ten players delivered standout performances: Yejun K, Niko D, Rafael H, David C, Andy E, Travis C, Minh-An D, Andrew N, Ethan G, and Rhodri W. Adam K was unavailable due to other sports commitments. Despite the loss, the team showed excellent defensive organization and character.

matches.performance_notes: SECOND WIN OF THE SEASON! Solid 4-2 victory with strong team performance. Niko D converted a penalty while Andy E missed one. Adam K scored twice from follow-ups showing smart positioning and clinical finishing. Travis C scored a beautiful goal assisted by Andy E. Rafael H hit the post twice, showing the team created even more chances. Despite many wasted opportunities, the team showed resilience and determination to secure the win. Strong performance overall with good attacking play.

matches.performance_notes: Hard-fought match with excellent performances despite the 1-4 loss. Andy E kept a clean sheet in the first half with outstanding defensive support from Yejun K and Rafael H - both had great games controlling the back line. Very tight, competitive first half ended 0-0. Second half saw opponent take 2-0 lead, but team created many chances and nearly completed first comeback when Travis C scored from Owen H's beautiful cross to make it 1-2. Pushed hard for equalizer but opponent scored controversial offside goal. Fourth goal came on counter-attack after entire team pushed forward for last-minute equalizer attempt. Team showed great character, created quality chances, and competed strongly throughout. Positive performance to build on.

matches.location: Pitt Meadows Secondary School - Field 1 East Turf

goal_details.notes: Hat-trick! First goal early, second following up on keeper save, third from Rhodri corner with beautiful finish
First two goals of the season! Breakthrough performance after hitting bars and posts all season

matches.performance_notes: Dominant 6-2 victory with complete control from start to finish despite missing key players! Travis C hat-trick led the attack with brilliant finishing including a corner goal. Owen H finally broke through with his first TWO goals of the season after hitting posts and bars all year - breakthrough moment with Andy E assisting the second goal and adding to his many assists this season! Rafael H scored his second goal in last three matches with an amazing performance. Team controlled the match throughout both halves. First half ended 4-1 with exceptional performances from Adam K, Yejun K, Rafael H, and Ethan G who made many great saves as goalkeeper. Second half saw Travis add the fifth goal with great awareness, following up on an incredible save from their keeper. Opponent scored to make it 5-2, then Travis completed his hat-trick from a Rhodri W corner with a beautiful finish. Final seconds featured an INSANE Buffon-level save from Yejun K. Team showed great depth dealing with absences (Eunjun K fever, Minh-An D travelling) and Niko D's early exit due to muscle injury after just 5 minutes. Perfect way to end the first part of the season! Team celebrated with hot chocolate and photos.
